name: Project SED
description:
This indie game is an attempt to recreate the old stealth action games that have captured gamers hearts in the past. Stealth action is pretty close to a dead genre, with what little that comes out relying on high budget celebrities and VFX.  

Thank you for your time and interest,

-A dev nostalgic about the past

Controls:WASD - move

scroll wheel: cycle through weapons

right click - aim

left click - fire

Music:

credit to Punch-Deck @ https://soundcloud.com/punch-deck for freely providing some kick ass open source tunes
